summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 48th Avenue Southwest, and same produced from West Edmunds Street to West Dakota Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9603 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
